name: fmihel-lazy-load
description: lazy load and imports module webapp

scripts.git-push: git push origin main && git push origin main --tag
scripts.npm-publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run git-push
scripts.npm-publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && npm run git-push
scripts.npm-publish-major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && npm run git-push

author: fmihel76@gmail.com
